caption: Identity Analysis
description: The identity analysis object describes details about the analysis performed on an Identity i.e. AWS IAM User, GCP IAM Principal, etc.
name: identity_analysis

credential_last_used_time.description: Timestamp when the credential, represented by the credential_uid, was last used.

user.description: Details about the identity that was analyzed.

password_last_used_time.description: Timestamp when the password was last used for authentication.

user_last_used_time.description: Timestamp when the user account was last active.
